name: Mini & Maxi: Fruit catch!
description:
Mini & Maxi: Fruit Catch - a minigame developed by Studio Upp & Ner.

Help Mini & Maxi catch as much fruit as they can before the timer runs out! 🍎

Controls: Mouse to navigate menus, arrow keys/wasd to move, esc to exit fullscreen

This game is also available for Android devices: Google Play
